title: Stage Lv6-P1-S08
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I had been working on this project when the announcement came, and now I will have to adjust my plans.
She has been studying here for years, had completed her thesis, and will graduate next month.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 발표가 있었을 때 이 프로젝트를 진행하고 있었는데, 이제 계획을 조정해야 할 것입니다.
sentences.en: I had been working on this project when the announcement came, and now I will have to adjust my plans.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 수년간 여기서 공부해왔고, 논문을 완료했으며, 다음 달에 졸업할 예정입니다.
sentences.en: She has been studying here for years, had completed her thesis, and will graduate next month.

sentences.kr: 회사는 제품을 출시했었고, 긍정적인 피드백을 받아오고 있으며, 새로운 시장으로 확장할 것입니다.
sentences.en: The company had launched the product, has been receiving positive feedback, and will expand to new markets.

sentences.kr: 팀은 몇 달 동안 준비해왔었고, 어제 프레젠테이션을 마쳤으며, 내일 결과를 받을 것입니다.
sentences.en: The team had been preparing for months, finished the presentation yesterday, and will receive results tomorrow.

sentences.kr: 그는 이전에 비슷한 경험을 해봤었고, 현재 새로운 도전을 하고 있으며, 곧 성공할 것입니다.
sentences.en: He had experienced similar situations before, is currently facing new challenges, and will succeed soon.

sentences.kr: 우리는 계획을 세우지 못했었고, 현재 어려움을 겪고 있으며, 해결책을 찾지 못할 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: We had not made plans, are currently experiencing difficulties, and probably will not find a solution.

sentences.kr: 시장이 변화해왔었고, 우리는 적응해오고 있으며, 앞으로도 계속 발전시켜 나갈 것입니다.
sentences.en: The market had been changing, we have been adapting, and will continue to develop further.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트는 지연되었었지만, 현재 순조롭게 진행되고 있고, 예정대로 완료될 것입니다.
sentences.en: The project had been delayed, but is now progressing smoothly and will be completed on schedule.
